impact-statement: Potassium ions enter and leave human sperm cells via a calcium-dependent ion channel that is also pH-independent.

equal-contrib.equal-contrib: These authors contributed equally to this work

contribution.con1: NM, Helped design the experiments, performed most of the experiments, analyzed and interpreted data, and wrote the manuscript
contribution.con2: NMN, Performed molecular biology experiments, analyzed and interpreted data, and helped write the manuscript
contribution.con3: S-ASC, Performed immunocytochemistry experiments, analyzed the data, and helped revise the manuscript
contribution.con4: JFS, Contacted patients, conducted surgeries and provided biopsy samples, discussed the results, and commented on the manuscript
contribution.con5: PVL, Conceived the project, designed the experiments, performed pilot experiments, analyzed and interpreted data, and wrote the manuscript
